JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA TUESDAY, THE 9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 19TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1l.MC.No. 6418 of 2013 CC.2210/2009 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I, ALUVA CRIME NO.198/2007 OF THRIKKAKARA POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM PETITIONER/ACCUSED: JATHAPPAN AGED 55 YEARS, S/O. SEKHARAN, PUZHAKKAREDATH HOUSE, PATTUPURA TEMPLE BAGAM, KAKKANAD KARA, KAKKANAD VILLAGE. BY ADV.SRI.JAISON JOSEPH RESPONDENT /STATE: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, REPRESENTING SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, THRIKKAKARA POLICE STATION. *ADDL. 2ND RESPONDENT IS IMPLEADED: 2 K.P. VINOD, SUB INPECTOR OF POLICE, THRIKKAKARA POLICE STATION, KOCHI CITY. *ADDL.R2 IS IMPLEADED AS PER ORDER DATED 09.01.2018 IN IA.3517/2017 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.T.R. RENJITH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 09-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: EL Bes h oe eset Crl.MC.No, 6418 of 2013 2013/KERII89 APPENDIX PETITIONER (S)' ANNEXURES Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT (CHARGE SHEET) IN C.C.2210/2009 ON THE FILES OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT I ALUVA A2 TRUE PHOTOCOPY OF THE SCENE MAHAZAR IN CRIME NO.198/2007 OF THRIKKAKARA POLICE STATION RESPONDENT (S)' ANNEXURE NIL TRUE COPY P.S. TO JUDGE EL eae 2018/KER/989 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 9" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in CC.2210/2009 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Aluva, based on Annexure-A1 final report in Crime No.198/2007 _ of Thrikkakara Police Station, for the offences punishable under Sections 285, 294(b) and 504 IPC. The allegation is that on 08.05.2007 at 11 a.m., the petitioner was found engaged in burning some papers inside the compound of the institution named KBPS. When he was directed by the de facto complainant to stop it, he questioned the authority of the de facto complainant. 2. None of the offences is attracted in the matter. Unnecessarily, the petitioner is being harassed, just for wrecking vengeance. Matters being so, all further proceedings against the petitioner in CC.2210/2009 of the pate ines 2018/KER/989 Crl.M.C.6418/2013 :2: Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Aluva, based on Annexure-A1 final report in Crime No.198/2007_ of Thrikkakara Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioner in CC.2210/2009 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Aluva, based on Annexure-A1 final report in Crime No.198/2007_ of Thrikkakara Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/09/01 1! True Copy // PS to Judge
